snippet.title: Mother Direct 2021 Trailer | MOTHER²
snippet.description:
Come follow us for the latest updates, as well as Like and Subscribe!

LTD, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. Development footage is shown and is subject to change. Please support Hobonichi and Nintendo by playing EarthBound via Nintendo Switch Online.
